comments:
When opening a PHP file containing a phpdoc-style comment, the PHP editor encounters a NPE, stack:

Here is a sample file that will cause it to bomb:

<?php
class test_npe_class {
	/**@var test*/
	private $something;
}
?>

Without the "/**@var test*/" line, the PHP editor opens correctly.

PDT version: 1.0.0.v20070816-79--E7QYGHEHNQ6
